001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.format;
002
003/**
004 * A <strong>TTLL</strong> formatter that has the layout of <strong>TTLL - Time, Thread,
005 * Level, Logger</strong> but allows changing the format of time, thread, level, logger,
006 * etc.
007 */
008public class StandardEventFormatter extends AbstractStandardEventFormatter {
009
010        protected StandardEventFormatter( //
011                        LevelFormatter levelFormatter, //
012                        TimestampFormatter timestampFormatter, //
013                        NameFormatter nameFormatter, //
014                        MessageFormatter messageFormatter, //
015                        ThrowableFormatter throwableFormatter, //
016                        KeyValuesFormatter keyValuesFormatter, ThreadFormatter threadFormatter) {
017                super(timestampFormatter, threadFormatter, levelFormatter, nameFormatter, messageFormatter, throwableFormatter,
018                                keyValuesFormatter);
019        }
020
021        /**
022         * Create {@link StandardEventFormatter} builder.
023         * @return builder.
024         */
025        public static Builder builder() {
026                return new Builder();
027        }
028
029        /**
030         * Builder for {@link StandardEventFormatter} aka TTLL formatter.
031         */
032        public static final class Builder extends AbstractBuilder<Builder> {
033
034                private Builder() {
035                        super();
036                }
037
038                @Override
039                protected Builder self() {
040                        return this;
041                }
042
043                /**
044                 * Builds the formatter.
045                 * @return formatter.
046                 */
047                public StandardEventFormatter build() {
048                        return new StandardEventFormatter(levelFormatter, timestampFormatter, nameFormatter, messageFormatter,
049                                        throwableFormatter, keyValuesFormatter, threadFormatter);
050                }
051
052        }
053
054}
